name: //network/ ToyBox (DEMO Beta 1)
description:
This is a WarioWare esque game. It's a fangame made with help from people in my server, and released today as a demo version in time for the birthday of somebody very special.
This game has 5 microgames in total and a simple boss microgame at the end of the run. Infinite mode is disabled.

Please report any bugs or anything that might seem off.
